resources.string: The purpose of Health Advisor is to help you overcome common health issues such as headaches, colds, high fever etc by suggesting consumption of certain natural or non-natural substances. Therefore, it makes you capable of managing possible health problems on your own, without necessarily consulting a doctor. Alongside, it provides a reference to the E-substances that can be found only in non-natural products and can help you maintain a healthy - safe diet.

You can navigate from the main menu to search either an E-substance or a disease . E-substances can be searched by their number only . Diseases , on the other hand , can be searched in two ways . You can either find a disease by its name or by its general disease category .

Each disease can be dealt with several treatments - substances . Each treatment-substance is displayed on a different tab which contains basic information about this particular substance such as where it can be found , its effects and side effects .
